676.title: Very broad copyright license on your content, includes right for Delicious to distribute through any media

tosdr.case: This service employs a broad copyright license over user content including the right to distribute through any media
tosdr.tldr: The copyright license granted to Delicious is not limited to operating the service. Your content can be exploited “in any and all media or distribution channels (now known or hereafter created)” i.e. it can be distributed by Delicious outside the Delicious service.

697.license-for-this-file: This work is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported License. To view a copy of this license, visit http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/ or send a letter to Creative Commons, 444 Castro Street, Suite 900, Mountain View, California, 94041, .USA
697.title: Non-transparent use of cookies and third party ads

tosdr.case: This service allows tracking via third-party cookies for purposes including targeted advertising.
tosdr.tldr: Data collected with cookies is kept for an undefined period of time. Also, Delicious' “Third party advertisers may also place or read cookies on your browser.”

772.license-for-this-file: This work is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported License. To view a copy of this license, visit http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/ or send a letter to Creative Commons, 444 Castro Street, Suite 900, Mountain View, California, 94041, .USA
772.title: No Right to leave the service

tosdr.case: You cannot delete your account for this service
tosdr.tldr: Even if you terminate your account, Delicious “may retain an archived copy for legitimate business purposes”. The copyright license does not end.

981.license-for-this-file: This work is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported License. To view a copy of this license, visit http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/ or send a letter to Creative Commons, 444 Castro Street, Suite 900, Mountain View, California, 94041, .USA
981.title: Your personal information are an asset for business transfers

tosdr.case: may sell your data in merger
tosdr.tldr: Delicious “may sell, transfer or otherwise share some or all of its assets, including your Personal Information, in connection with a merger, acquisition, reorganization or sale of assets or in the event of bankruptcy.”

1005.license-for-this-file: This work is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported License. To view a copy of this license, visit http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/ or send a letter to Creative Commons, 444 Castro Street, Suite 900, Mountain View, California, 94041, .USA
1005.title: Only for personal and non-commercial use

tosdr.case: This service is only available for use individually and non-commercially.
tosdr.tldr: Your use of the service is restricted with “a limited license to access, share, tag and save to your Account any Member Content (including another Member's public “bookmarks”) for your personal and non-commercial use”.

1113.title: [bad] delicious new terms 5. third party services get access to personal information

tosdr.case: Third parties used by the service are bound by confidentiality obligations
tosdr.tldr: Third parties have access to your Personal Information only to perform certain tasks on behalf of Delicious and are obligated not to disclose or use it for any other purpose.
